items.text: I had the same error and traced it to a bug with DrawableCompat.wrap() in 23.4.0 that doesn't exist in earlier & later versions of the support library.
items.href: android - IllegalArgumentException: width and height must be > 0 in activity - Stack Overflow

items.text: This bug incorrectly sets the drawable bounds to 0 (or negative in the case of an inset drawable).
items.href: android - IllegalArgumentException: width and height must be > 0 in activity - Stack Overflow
